reviews.review: 2020 yƒ±lƒ± geldi ve 11 ya≈üƒ±nda internet kafe ile hayatƒ±mƒ±za giren Cs hayatƒ±mƒ±zda olmaya devam ediyor. Ama adam akƒ±llƒ±, hileye m√ºsade etmeyen deathmatch ve zombi server bulamaz olduk. Eskiler bir bir kapandƒ±.
Only OG's r allowed to buy it. :*

This game is amazing, from the wide variety of maps, to the ability to bhop and gain speed up to 300 u/s (seems like nothing but it helps a lot). Practice really makes perfect in this game because basically everything is balanced, the only thing that isn't fair, is some of the maps, even then, it's easy to dominate if you play. Deagle is amazing, AK is amazing, every gun in this game has it's cons and it's pros, AK is really, really strong but the recoil gets really messy, Deagle is a one shot wonder if you can aim, but only 7 rounds in the mag, you can tell valve or whoever made this did an amazing job at it. This game is better in many ways compared to GO. While bhopping though, be careful, read the rules on the servers you join, and just have a blast.
Did I tell you that you can bhop?

Just a little tip, stay still while firing, if you move at all, your bullets will fire everywhere except where you're aiming. If you go one direction, your weapon will follow, you hold A to go left, the bullets will go left as well, same for grenades. Always aim for the head as well, it's so good lmao.
Lo unico que se puede decir de este juego es que es uno de los mejores clasicos que se mantiene vivo.
